en.title: Official Appointment
en.content:
FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of International Golf Long Drive Specialist, Jean Daniels, as our company's spokesman for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Jean Daniels' personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. Welcome, Jean!
Click Here to Read Jean Daniel's Testimonial

meta.description:
Jean Daniels talking about his experiences with FE Quantum Pendant at HQ on Wednesday,
28th March 2007.
meta.author: KLHunter
